questions.question: Have you been feeling down or sad lately?
Do you often feel anxious or worried?
Have you experienced changes in your sleep patterns recently?
Do you have trouble concentrating or staying focused?
Have you lost interest in activities you used to enjoy?
Do you often feel fatigued or lacking in energy?
Are you experiencing changes in your appetite or weight?
Do you ever have thoughts of harming yourself?
Are you easily irritable or angered?
Do you have difficulty controlling your temper?
Have you experienced any traumatic events in your past?
Do certain situations or triggers remind you of past trauma?
